summary: Followers AI when in a set Home
descriptionHtml:
MHiYH was originally Made by Volek and last updated March 2013. 
Volek later had desired Smashly to continue his work:

As you might know, I stopped working on this mod (or any mod for that matter) a long while ago. But I just learned that Smashly has taken up on the task and released an awesome update. Check it out here:
Huge thanks to smashly for the great work!

December 14, 2014, Smashly had asked me to assist in maintaining the Nexus Page for his  work on " My Home is your Home "  2+

I hope you all enjoy this redone version, as much as I and many that has downloaded MHiYH 2+.

Thanks and kudos to Volek and Smashly for this amazing MOD.
author: Smashy and Volek
